lines.text: You knew that whore and you didn't tell anyone. You're a priest, a priest. How's that going to look in the papers.

[arrives at a nursing home to visit his mother]
Mrs. Phil Spellacy, please. I know the way.
You'll have to wait. She's receiving communion.

[pushing past the nun]
May all your sons be Jesuits, Sister.
Cut the crap. I don't have all day. It's been 20 years since my last confession. I had a lot of things to do.
How's ma? Is she still eating with her fingers?
Well, she says the early Christian martyrs didn't have spoons.
Tell her they didn't have Instant Cream of Wheat, either.
I paid for half and half. I should get half and half.
But you only did half.
I want you to get me a list of all people with the same M.O.
That's gonna take awhile, sergeant.
She was cut in two. Do you think it's an epidemic, like the flu?

You know who we're going to pull in on this one? Panty sniffers, weenie flashers, guys who fall in love with their shoes, guys who beat their hog on the number 43 bus, What? Do you think I'm gonna lose any sleep over who took this broad out? Hmmm? Pissing strawberries and whipped cream, you think that she's a 9 to 5 stiff, Tommy? No overime! You know how we're gonna break this one? In a couple of years they'll bring in a guy who ran a red light. "I killed the girl, " he'll say. "What girl?" we'll say. "The girl - the girl with the rose tattoo on her ass," he'll say. "Which one is that?" we'll say.
[laughs]
That's how we're gonna break it.
[Tom gives Des the rosary he took from the priest who died while in bed with a prostitute]
He might have been there on a pastoral call.
When was the last time you hung your pants over the side of the bed while making a house call?
I admit, that's not the way they teach you at the seminary.
Msgr. Spellacy's table, please.
I thought that Msgr. Spellacy would be dining with Mr. Amsterdam.
Well, you thought wrong, fuckhead.
How about it, Tom? Can you get your brother the monsignor to say a mass for this cunt? It'll make the front page.
Howard, we don't even know yet whether or not she was a Catholic cunt.

[to receptionist after the intruder at Standard's office gets away]
What do you do here?
Me? I do great French.
Don't forget, you were with us when we met that girl.
Yes, we *met* her. You *fucked* her.
Nothing like a stiff to make me crave Chinese food!

[Talking to Des about their father to Des]
One thing the old man never missed was a wake. Good booze and plenty of it!

[to Tom]
Have you ever noticed when you get old, your feet swell up.

[In the cofessional]
I'm your confessor.

[Indignantly]
You're my confessor, but you wheel and deal out there!
Yeah, but you're in here.

[Feeling a twinge of conscience after slapping Brenda]
I'm sorry about that.
[after a pause]
Okay?
[after another pause]
You know my temper.
I need you like I need another fuck.

[Talking about the priest's heart attack death in the brothel]
How long was he here?
It was the second one that did it.

[Referring to the dead priest in her brothel]
Heart attack while he was committing a mortal sin!

[to Des]
Looks like a leprauchan - thinks like an arab.
[last lines]
This is it. This is it.
It's nice to have somebody to say goodbye to. Who have I got, uh, the Lieutenant Governor? What, am I gonna do, call him up and say, "hey remember me, you used to be a regular"?
